title: Pure Fate
description: You can only hide from yourself for so long...  If you liked Bared to You or Fifty Shades of Gray, you will enjoy this story!    After finishing filming in Bora Bora, Madison goes back to Los Angeles to continue her schooling while Johnny stays overseas to film a movie, but Madison worries that their hectic schedules will interfere with their relationship.  As Johnny tires of the role playing and tries to distance himself from his characters, he struggles to figure out who he truly is. Who is Johnny Logan? And is there a place for Madison in his superstar life?  This is the third instalment of the Blind Date series. The other instalments include:  Blind Date (Book 1) Role Play (Book 2) Pure Fate (Book 3)  **This multi-POV 15k+ word new adult erotic romance contains strong language and explicit scenes. Adult readers only!***  keywords: m/f, new adult sex, college, multi-POV, role play
author: Violette Paradis
